short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance Language learning on YouTube with focused viewing and interactive transcripts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free Open Source Browser Extension for those wanting to learn languages on YouTube interactively.

Github repo: https://github.com/aristidesnakos/chatwithyoutube
Pairs well with: https://llanai.com for practicing verbally your language skills
